name: OutRunners
overview: The Ultimate Arcade Race Comes Home! YOW! Get behind the wheel of one of the hottest racing machines ever to burn up your screen! Strap in, put the pedal to the metal and brave hairpin turns, dangerous detours, and constantly changing road and weather conditions in the first touring race to span the globe. It's bumper-to-bumper excitement as you tear up the roads in San Francisco, Hawaii, Egypt, Russia, and 36 other courses - even race underwater! Force out your opponents while playing head-to-head in speed-shattering split-screen action! Choose from eight ultra-cool vehicles, each with its own unique characteristics, such as transmission type, power, and maneuverability. So what are you waiting for? Get out there and kick some asphalt!
